item.title: Why I Love B2B over B2C [Atrium]
item.description: Why I Love B2B over B2C. Justin Kan. Atrium. https://www.atrium.co/blog/b2b-vs-b2c/ . Jul 11, 2018. B2B customers will actually pay for your product. You have a clear execution path - they’ll tell you and pay for features. Companies don’t quickly flip flop between products. Consumers are too price sensitive and finicky. B2B customers are rational, and thus understandable. They care about whether a solution solves their problem and if the solution is important enough to pay for.
